step.description: Dependent call: Download the first image from the previous search results.
Edge case: Attempt to download from an invalid URL to test error handling.

step.description: Happy path: Generate a blue settings icon using default size (64x64).
Edge case: Generate a red warning icon with custom size (128x128).
Edge case: Try to use cloud generation flag even though it's not implemented.
Edge case: Test search with empty query to ensure proper error handling.

result.result: {"error": "未知错误: 'query' 参数不能为空且必须是字符串类型"}
